metaDescription: Puck Pals is a hockey podcast for real fans – breaking down plays, trades, stories and culture around the greatest game on ice.

brand.name: Puck Pals
brand.tagline: A hockey podcast for real fans

hero.headline: Welcome to Puck Pals
hero.subheadline: Your home on the web for everything hockey – stories, analysis, laughs and the odd broken stick.

episodes.title: Season Recap: Highlights and Lowlights
episodes.description: We dive into the biggest moments of the season, analyzing key plays and discussing what made this year special.

episodes.title: Trade Deadline Madness
episodes.description: A full breakdown of the most surprising trades and how they reshape the league landscape.

episodes.title: Behind the Bench: Coaching Stories
episodes.description: We share stories from behind the bench and dig into how coaching decisions impact big games.

aboutSection.title: About Puck Pals
paragraphs: Puck Pals is more than just a hockey podcast – it’s a community for fans who live and breathe the game.
Whether you’re a seasoned fan or just getting into hockey, we’re here to break down the plays, talk storylines, share memories and celebrate what makes hockey the greatest game on earth.

contactSection.title: Contact Us
contactSection.blurb: Have a story to share? Want to suggest a topic or be a guest on the show? We’d love to hear from you.
